name: POMONA (black unisex tank)
description:
This solid black tank top is accompanied with a vintage looking Pomona print. With it's soft 6.1 oz, 100% cotton construction, it will leave you feeling so great you will be dying to wear it over and over again.

•	Solid color body. 
•	UC logo on upper back. 
•	Unisex fit tank top. 
•	6.1 oz 100% preshrunk cotton. 
•	Bound-on self trim neck and armhole. 
•	Double needle bottom hem. 
•	Machine washable

name: POMONA (ladies white tee)
description:
Solid White Tee with black line drawing of Pomona. These are fitted tees so if you like a looser fit, you may consider a larger size. With it's soft 4.5 oz, 100% ring spun cotton construction, it will leave you feeling so great you will be dying to wear it over and over again.

•	Solid color body. 
•	Unisex fit tee. 
•	4.5 oz 100% ring spun cotton. 
•	30/1's fine knit jersey, tubular construction. 
•	Ribbed crew taped neck and shoulders. 
•	double needle sleeves and bottom hem. 
•	Machine washable

name: UC FLAG (pullover)
description:
This solid black pullover hood is accompanied by a distress-styled, umeus cloth flag in faded white, gold, and smooth grey colors to give you a vintage look and feel. With it's soft 7.5 oz, 80% ringspun cotton/ 20% polyester construction, it will leave you feeling so great you will be dying to wear it over and over again. 

•	Solid color body.
• "UC Circle Logo" print on breast.
•	Unisex pullover hood.
•	7.5 oz 80% ringspun cotton/ 20% polyester.
•	Jersey lined hood with matching drawstring.
• Ribbed cuffs and waistband with 5% spandex.
•	Machine washable

name: CHURCH
description:
This solid white tee is accompanied by a satirical interpretation of the modern, american, church world, according to The UC, colored in black and pastel red. With it's soft 4.5 oz, 100% ring spun cotton construction, it will leave you feeling so great you will be dying to wear it over and over again. 

•	Solid color body.
•	Unisex fit tee.

name: UCBOMBS (long sleeve)
description:
This solid black longsleeve tee is accompanied by classic tattoo-style bombs and banners sporting the UC motto colored in smooth rustic gold. With it's soft 4.5 oz, 100% ring spun cotton construction, it will leave you feeling so great you will be dying to wear it over and over again. 

•	Solid color body.
•	Unisex fit tee.
•	4.5 oz 100% preshrunk cotton.
•	Fixed cuffs for longer lifetime.
•	Deluxe 30's soft style yarns.
•	Seamless double-needle 7/8 collar.
•	Taped neck and shoulders.
•	Rolled forward shoulders for better fit.
•	Hemmed and double-needled sleeve and bottom hems.
•	Quarter-turned to eliminate center crease.
•	Machine washable
